channel.title: I need help with portforwarding - take a look!
channel.description:
Hi, atm im just trying to figure out how to get no-ip on my server ip since no one plays hamachi anymore..
Anyway..i've created an ip or w\e on no-ip.com and yea, now i heard i have to do something on port forward.com, i've read some guides on their etc.. im upto the step where you have to pick what game it is..
i coulden't find 'silabs something' \ 'Moparscape' \ 'Runescape' someone tell me what it's under and if you can what is next?
Thanks :\

item.title: I need help with portforwarding - take a look!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

They wouldn’t have that in there because this is not a absolute famous game, and no one plays hamachi anymore because some people don’t trust the program. And go into control panel>network connections>local area connection>support.

Then were it says “default gateway:” thats your ip, type that in the address bar in mozilla firefox or internet explorer and it should tell you are kind of default gateway, then find your gateway kind for example 2700Hg or somthing like that here Scroll down to find it. Then look at the tutorial and it will tell you, if you cant understand it, don’t even try to portforward…

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with portforwarding - take a look!
